2009, Sun: first light

Thanks to Dawn, and the Dawn blog, we have some pictures of the sunrise, from one of the first land masses to see the 2009. [caption id="" align="aligncenter" width="400" caption="Photo by Paul Moss. New Zeland"][/caption] [caption id="" align="aligncenter" width="400" caption="Photo by Paul Moss. New Zeland"][/caption] Enjoy the pictures at this blog entry. (Thanks Paul Moss for the pictures and Ricardo Reis for the Dawn initiative).
